title: It's Been a While
snippet: Bike wouldn’t unlock. Life’s been busy, frustrating at times—dealing with back pain, work stuff, memory lapses, and some lingering anger, but trying to stay disciplined and keep moving.

title: A Perfect Day
snippet: Food, Great gym session, Jumma, Islamic Lecture, Cycling in the rain, melancholy of watching Succession and finally study. Doesn't get much better than this.

title: First Story
snippet: It's a place where I share my chaotic thoughts, experiences, writing and perhaps a bit of coding journey.
